synopsis.text: York's Metropolitan Museum of Art, Fujita Reiji, known as 'The Professor,' now runs Gallery Fake in Japan. Despite showcasing replicas of famous artworks, rumors swirl about Fujita's involvement in the black market, dealing with stolen masterpieces. When Sarah Halifa, a descendant of an esteemed Arab family, encounters Fujita after a stolen painting from her home is recovered, she decides to join his team as his assistant. As Tokyo's Takada Museum curator Mitamura Sayako seeks to expose Fujita's illicit activities, the world of Gallery Fake becomes a thrilling intersection of art, intrigue, and deception.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
